name: Em's roots
description:
Em's roots 

You are playing as Em, but there is another soul joined together with your body

Soul's name is Warrior, Em can't fight monsters that roam around so it's up to the Warrior to handle that. But she can only use Em's body for limited amount of time

This game was developed in 2 days for GMTK jam, by only one developer who didn't sleep and was only alive because of coffee :3
